snippet.title: Mimic Me Announcement Trailer - Demo Available!
snippet.description:
Demo Available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3195960/Mimic_Me_Demo/
Checkout our Deckbuilding Roguelike Mori Carta: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1570830/Mori_Carta/

Mimic Me Demo is a turn-based roguelike game where you control a mischievous crate mimic navigating through a treacherous board filled with enemy crates. Roll your mimic across the board, strategically destroying waves of enemy crates to collect gold. Use the gold to upgrade the sides of your crate, enhancing your abilities and preparing for tougher challenges. With each turn, you'll need to outsmart your foes, optimize your upgrades, and survive the onslaught to become the ultimate mimic master.
This demo includes the first playable character and the first playable level.

Follow Us:
Mailing List - http://eepurl.com/iM8CLE
Discord - https://discord.gg/Xrb4svR7C2
